description: This file sets up and demonstrates the use of a Couchbase Vector Database with an AI agent, including configuration of the database index, environment variables, and an async function to run the agent for a specific query.

classes.name: SearchIndex
classes.description: Defines the configuration for the Couchbase search index, including properties for indexing documents and vectors.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base loaded from a PDF URL, integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs tasks.

classes.name: CouchbaseSearch
classes.description: A class encapsulating the Couchbase vector search configuration and connection details.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text into vectors using OpenAI's API.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that loads the knowledge base, waits for index synchronization, and prompts the agent to respond to a query.
